content.title: Uses
content.description: The fruits are of dietary use and are an important source of carbohydrate, protein, fat, minerals and vitamins. Jackfruit contains flavonoids, sterols and prenylflavones. Fruit has antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, antibacterial, anticariogenic, antifungal, antineoplastic, hypoglycemic, wound healing effects and causes a transient decrease in the sexual activity. The decoction of the leaves possesses hypoglycemic effects. Heart wood is used as timber.
